SEARCH

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
Person
Customer
public class Customer extends Person
The Customer class represents a customer who has a checking account, savings account, and credit account. It extends the Person class to inherit personal information.

    Field

  • Field Details

    • lastCustomerId

      public static int lastCustomerId
      The ID assigned to the most recently added customer. Used to generate unique customer IDs by incrementing this value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer()
      Default constructor that initializes a Customer object with default Checking, Saving, and Credit accounts.

    • Customer

      public Customer(int identificationNumber, String firstName, String lastName, String dateOfBirth, String address, String phoneNumber, Checking checkingAccount, Saving savingsAccount, Credit creditAccount)
      Constructor with parameters to initialize a Customer object with the given personal information and financial accounts.
      Parameters:
      identificationNumber - the customer's identification number
      firstName - the customer's first name
      lastName - the customer's last name
      dateOfBirth - the customer's date of birth
      address - the customer's address
      phoneNumber - the customer's phone number
      checkingAccount - the customer's checking account
      savingsAccount - the customer's savings account
      creditAccount - the customer's credit account

    • addTransaction

      public void addTransaction(String accountType, double startingBalance, double endingBalance, String transactionDescription)
      Adds a transaction record for a specified account type, including details such as the starting balance, ending balance, and a transaction description. If there are existing transactions for the specified account type, the new transaction is appended to the current list.
      Parameters:
      accountType - The type of account associated with the transaction (e.g., "Checking", "Savings", "Credit").
      startingBalance - The balance of the account before the transaction.
      endingBalance - The balance of the account after the transaction.
      transactionDescription - A description of the transaction.  

    • getTransactions

      public String getTransactions(String accountType)
      Retrieves the transaction history for a specified account type.
      Parameters:
      accountType - The type of account whose transaction history is to be retrieved (e.g., "Checking", "Savings", "Credit").
      Returns:
      A string containing the transaction history for the specified account type, or an empty string if no transactions are recorded.
